shortdesc.ph: Sets the playback speed of the current music file.
Sets the playback speed of the current music file.
Sets the playback speed of the current music file.
Sets the playback speed of the current music file.

section.p: You need to call this method after calling and receiving the callback reporting the playback state as AudioMixingStatePlaying.
You must call this method after calling and receiving the callback reporting the playback state as AudioMixingStatePlaying.
You must call this method after and after receiving the callback reporting the playback state as audioMixingStatePlaying.
You need to call this method after calling and receiving the callback reporting AUDIO_MIXING_STATE_PLAYING.

plentry.pd:
The playback speed of the music file. The recommended range is [50,400], where:
50: 0.5x speed.
100: Original speed.
400: 4x speed.

The playback speed of the music file. The recommended range is [50,400], where:
50: 0.5x speed.
100: Original speed.
400: 4x speed.

The playback speed of the music file. The recommended range is [50, 400], where:
50: 0.5x speed.
100: Original speed.
400: 4x speed.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
